game.name: Cycle of Struggle: Ardengrad
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, 텍스트 크기 조절, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Cycle of Struggle: Ardengrad is a visual novel about a country on the brink of civil war. You're not a hero or a villain—just a student caught in the storm. Will you join the ranks or vanish into the shadows? The revolution won’t wait. And it won’t forget your choice.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cycle of Struggle: Ardengrad is a visual novel about a country on the brink of civil war. You're not a hero or a villain—just a student caught in the storm. Will you join the ranks or vanish into the shadows? The revolution won’t wait. And it won’t forget your choice.
